ShortDescription: A user-friendly decentralized lending and borrowing platform that aims to simplify the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) user experience.
Description: A user-friendly decentralized lending and borrowing platform that aims to simplify the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) user experience. Built on the Evmos ecosystem, Tashi offers a transparent, secure, and easy-to-use platform for anyone interested in decentralized lending and borrowing across multiple blockchains.
